about_the_game:
Step into the world of BloomTale, where your creativity blossoms as you manage your very own flower shop!



Each flower in BloomTale carries a unique meaning. Your mission is to master the art of flower language, create arrangements tailored to customers' requests, and ensure your blooms stay fresh and vibrant! But it's not just about the flowers — get to know your customers, who carry stories as unique as the bouquets they seek.



Whether you're unwinding after a long day or seeking a challenge, BloomTale offers the perfect balance of relaxation and engagement. Customize your shop, explore the meanings behind different flowers, and experiment with various flower types and decorations to let your creativity shine. Deliver the perfect bouquet and watch your shop's reputation bloom!



Features



  • Express your creativity:


Get creative and design your own floral compositions using a wide variety of flowers in different colors and styles. But remember, it's not just about aesthetics — BloomTale brings the rich tradition of flower language to life, allowing you to craft bouquets that convey specific emotions and messages. Make sure your arrangements meet customers' requests while adding your own personal touch! Beyond flowers, enhance your bouquet with gems, ribbons, and wrapping papers available in various colors and shapes.





  • Meet the locals:


Meet a variety of customers, each with their unique personalities, bringing their own preferences and intriguing backstories to your shop. Some may surprise you with their requests, while others add a touch of mystery to your daily routine. As you build relationships with these locals, you’ll uncover their stories and perhaps even form lasting connections. Who knows?





  • Shop management:


Keep your flowers fresh, manage wisely, and protect your blooms from pesky bugs! Maintain the highest quality to keep your customers happy and ensure the success of your flower shop.





  • Shop customization:


Personalize your shop's look with customizable furniture, decorations, and flower pots. Create the perfect ambiance that reflects your style.





  • Flower collection:


Discover and use 50+ unique flower types in your bouquets! As you level up your shop, unlock new flowers and expand your knowledge with the in-game floriography guide to learn more about each bloom, its meaning, and how best to use it in your arrangements.
